activate_my_card: To activate your card, please go to the Cards section in your app and follow the activation steps.
age_limit: You need to be at least 18 years old to open an account.
apple_pay_or_google_pay: Yes, your card can be added to Apple Pay or Google Pay directly through the app.
atm_support: You can use your card at any ATM that supports Visa or Mastercard.
automatic_top_up: You can enable automatic top-ups in the app settings under the Top-up section.
balance_not_updated_after_bank_transfer: Sometimes it takes up to 24 hours for a bank transfer to appear. Please wait a bit or contact support if the issue persists.
balance_not_updated_after_cheque_or_cash: Cheque and cash deposits may take a few business days to clear. We'll update your balance as soon as it's processed.
beneficiary_not_allowed: Please make sure the beneficiary account supports incoming transfers from your region or currency.
cancel_transfer: Transfers can be canceled only if they are still pending. Please check the transfer status in the app.
card_about_to_expire: You'll automatically receive a new card before your current one expires.
card_acceptance: Your card should be accepted anywhere Visa or Mastercard is supported.
card_arrival: Cards usually arrive within 5-10 business days after ordering.
card_delivery_estimate: You can track your card delivery status in the Cards section of the app.
card_linking: If your card isn't linking, make sure your details are correct and try again.
card_not_working: Please check if your card is activated and has sufficient balance. If not, contact support.
card_payment_fee_charged: A small processing fee might apply depending on the merchant or currency.
card_payment_not_recognised: If you don't recognize a payment, lock your card immediately and contact support.
card_payment_wrong_exchange_rate: Exchange rates depend on real-time market conditions. You can view details in your transaction history.
card_swallowed: If your card was swallowed by an ATM, please contact the bank that owns the machine or our support team.
cash_withdrawal_charge: Some ATMs may charge a withdrawal fee. Check your transaction receipt for details.
cash_withdrawal_not_recognised: If you didn't make this withdrawal, please report it in the app immediately.
change_pin: You can change your PIN at any supported ATM or within the app if your card allows it.
compromised_card: Please freeze your card immediately and request a replacement through the app.
contactless_not_working: Try cleaning your card's chip and making a chip transaction first to reset contactless.
country_support: We currently support accounts in selected countries. Please check the app or website for the list.
declined_card_payment: Your payment may have been declined due to insufficient funds or security checks.
declined_cash_withdrawal: Withdrawals may fail if your daily limit is reached or your balance is insufficient.
declined_transfer: Transfers can be declined for security or regulatory reasons. Check your email for more details.
direct_debit_payment_not_recognised: If you don't recognize a direct debit, cancel it immediately and notify support.
disposable_card_limits: Disposable virtual cards have lower limits for security reasons.
edit_personal_details: You can edit your details in the Profile section of the app.
exchange_charge: We apply a small exchange fee depending on the currency pair.
exchange_rate: You can see our current exchange rates in the app's Currency Exchange section.
exchange_via_app: Yes, you can exchange currencies instantly within the app.
extra_charge_on_statement: Some merchants add extra charges like tips or service fees. Check the receipt for details.
failed_transfer: Transfers may fail due to wrong recipient details or network issues. Please double-check and try again.
fiat_currency_support: We support all major fiat currencies such as USD, EUR, and GBP.
get_disposable_virtual_card: You can generate a disposable virtual card from the Cards section in the app.
get_physical_card: To order a physical card, go to Cards → Order physical card in the app.
getting_spare_card: You can request an extra or replacement card from the Cards section.
getting_virtual_card: Virtual cards can be created instantly in your app.
lost_or_stolen_card: Freeze your card immediately and order a replacement.
lost_or_stolen_phone: If your phone is lost, please log in from another device and secure your account.
order_physical_card: You can order your physical card directly from the app's Cards section.
passcode_forgotten: Use the 'Forgot passcode' option on the login screen to reset it.
pending_card_payment: Pending payments usually clear within a few days once the merchant processes them.
pending_cash_withdrawal: ATM transactions may appear pending until the ATM network confirms them.
pending_top_up: Top-ups can take a few hours to process depending on your bank.
pending_transfer: Transfers are pending until confirmed by the receiving bank. Please wait or contact support.
pin_blocked: You can unblock your PIN at any supported ATM or request a new one.
receiving_money: You can receive money via your account number or username, depending on your region.
Refund_not_showing_up: Refunds can take up to 10 business days depending on the merchant and bank.
request_refund: To request a refund, please contact the merchant first or use the in-app dispute option.
reverted_card_payment?: If a payment was reverted, the amount should appear back in your balance soon.
supported_cards_and_currencies: We support most Visa and Mastercard cards and major global currencies.
terminate_account: You can close your account from the Profile → Settings section.
top_up_by_bank_transfer_charge: We don't charge fees for top-ups via bank transfer, but your bank might.
top_up_by_card_charge: Some cards may charge a small top-up fee. Please check your card's terms.
top_up_by_cash_or_cheque: We currently don't support cash or cheque top-ups.
top_up_failed: Your top-up may have failed due to incorrect card details or insufficient funds.
top_up_limits: You can view your top-up limits in the app under Limits.
top_up_reverted: If your top-up was reverted, the funds should return to your source card shortly.
topping_up_by_card: You can top up instantly by adding a debit or credit card.
transaction_charged_twice: If you were charged twice, please report the duplicate transaction in the app.
transfer_fee_charged: Transfer fees vary depending on the amount and currency.
transfer_into_account: You can receive transfers directly into your account number or IBAN.
transfer_not_received_by_recipient: If the recipient hasn't received the transfer, confirm their details and contact support.
transfer_timing: Most transfers are instant, but some can take 1-2 business days depending on the bank.
unable_to_verify_identity: Please check that your photos and documents are clear and up-to-date.
verify_my_identity: You can verify your identity by uploading a valid photo ID in the app.
verify_source_of_funds: You might be asked to verify your source of funds for security and compliance reasons.
verify_top_up: Some top-ups may require verification for security reasons.
virtual_card_not_working: If your virtual card isn't working, make sure it's activated and not expired.
visa_or_mastercard: We issue both Visa and Mastercard cards depending on your region.
why_verify_identity: Identity verification is required by law to keep your account secure.
wrong_amount_of_cash_received: Please contact the ATM operator if you received the wrong amount.
wrong_exchange_rate_for_cash_withdrawal: Exchange rates at ATMs may differ from in-app rates due to third-party fees.
